name: ProductOverviewJordan
description: Responds to phrases that indicate that user wants to know Jordan product.

sampleUtterances.utterance: Tell me more about the jordan t-shirt
Give me details on the jordan t-shirt series
What's special about the jordan t-shirt?
Can you show me the jordan product?

plainTextMessage.value: Elevate your style with our iconic "Jordan" T-shirt from Klots Fashion. Inspired by the spirit of legendary athleticism, it blends sleek design with comfort. Wear a piece of sporting history. Type "jordan price" if you want to see the price and stock.
